references.reason: This paper provides technical details of GPT-4, a large language model whose decoding process is the focus of the current research.

references.paper_title: Accelerating large language model decoding with speculative sampling
references.reason: This is the seminal work introducing speculative decoding, a key technique analyzed in the current paper.

references.paper_title: Fast inference from transformers via speculative decoding
references.reason: This paper provides an empirical evaluation of speculative decoding, offering insights relevant to theoretical analysis.

references.paper_title: SpecInfer: Accelerating generative LLM serving with speculative inference and token tree verification
references.reason: This paper introduces a batch version of speculative decoding, which is further explored theoretically in the current work.

references.paper_title: Spectr: Fast speculative decoding via optimal transport
references.reason: This paper offers a theoretical perspective on speculative decoding using optimal transport, providing a foundation for the current analysis.
